name: Biking Mekong Detail from Ho Chi Minh to My Tho
description:
The majority of Vietnam’s fruits come from the Mekong Delta. Tien Giang is one the province supplies tropical fruits almost all year round. Cai Be floating market and its town are busy exchanging farm products everyday. People can find a variety of tropical fruits that are produced by farmers of this region in the markets of Saigon, Hue, and Ha Noi.
Cycling distance: 25 – 45 km
Road surfaces: trails & paths
Best time to go: All year round
